data.meta_site_name: World Music Central | Your Connection to traditional and contemporary World Music, including folk, roots, global music, ethno and crosscultural fusions
data.text:
Various Artists

The Rough Guide to Gypsy Swing (World Music Network RGNET 1138 CD, 2004)

The Rough Guide to Gypsy Swing is so crammed with such good stuff as to cause the listener to sweep invisible crumbs of a baguette off the table or search in vain for telltale circles of a café au lait or a glass of wine. The compilation is the work of series producer Phil Stanton and compiled by Guillaume Veillet for World Music Network. By traveling over to www.worldmusic.net, listeners can explore other rough guides that include Ethiopia, the Mambo, Asian Beat Box and African Rap, among many others.
